description: This file defines theming constants and styles for a Flutter application, including color palette, theme data, app bar, card, input decoration, buttons, and chips styling.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Contains color constants used throughout the Flutter app for consistent theming.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: Provides a static getter for the overall custom ThemeData called 'oceanProfessional', which defines detailed styling for the application using Material 3 design.

methods.name: oceanProfessional
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with custom color scheme, typography, and component themes for the application.
